Assign SwitchClass quadrants

assign_quadrants.Rd

Q1: delta > T & FC > 0 Q2: delta < -T & FC > 0 Q3: delta < -T & FC < 0 Q4: delta > T & FC < 0 Q0: otherwise

Usage

assign_quadrants(delta, fc, delta_thresh = 0.15)

Arguments

delta

named numeric vector (features).

fc

named numeric vector (same feature names as delta).

delta_thresh

numeric threshold for |delta|.

Value

factor vector of quadrant labels with names = features.
